name: convos
tagline: A self-hosted web client for IRC with persistent message history
description: Convos is a self-hosted web chat client for IRC that stores message history and offers a clean modern interface. It lets users maintain private chat servers, integrate with multiple networks, and access messages from any device.

features.title: Irc Web Client
features.description: Modern interface for classic IRC networks. Best of both worlds

features.title: Message History
features.description: Persistent storage of conversations and logs. Never miss a message

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Clean, responsive design for comfortable chatting. Pleasant user experience

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own IRC client with full control. Privacy-focused communication
